comments:
Hello.

Using a working faces-config.xml ( using myfaces 1.3.1 ), results in crash of the editor when opening with the faces editor:

Using a clean one ( only faces-config tag ) it starts like exspected.

Is there any solution how to find out which tag in the non working file causes this to happening.

kind regards

Torsten

Addition:

Using the one which works in the other project results in the exception too - something i have to too to got the editor working?

kind regards

Sorry my fault.

I've added the librarys and configured them in the preferences.

But the have to be added to the project properties too - didn't noticed that - but thats the difference i'Ve found to the working project.

sorry.

kind regards

Torsten
Closing as part of mass query to clean up old resolved bugs in untargetted milestones.
